name: Trick or Trap (yulotomorrow)
description:
This game is made with collaborations.

Programming: 小新

Design: yarin

Art/music: yulotomorrow

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Shadowlord game! Finally!!!

There's no treat when you face a shadowlord, only trick or trap :P

Other evil creature thought Shadowlord is weak so they chase a smol shadowlord, but the shadowlord would trick the other creatures into dangerous traps...

Show them who is the EVILEST creature!

Control:

Arrow keys: Move

Shift: Change skills

Enter: Use current skill
